aka: The Truth About the Frog Prince
trans_title: The Truth About the Frog Prince
introduction: 他是梦中王子吗？当每只青蛙爬出喷泉时，公主希望它会是她生命中最爱的一只。但只要有一个被扔到墙上，它就会变成一个大冲蚀。青蛙人能实现青蛙的空虚承诺吗？…关于青蛙王子的真相是由德累斯顿的动画电影工作室制作的，导演西格林德·哈马奇在德累斯顿工作了35年，1955年成立后不久加入。Is he the dream prince? As each frog climbs out of the fountain, the princess hopes it will be the one, the love of her life. But no sooner has one been flung against the wall than it turns out to be pretty much a washout. Will the frogman be able to live up to the empty promise of the frogs? … The Truth About the Frog Prince was produced by the DEFA Studio for Animation Films in Dresden, where director Sieglinde Hamacher worked for 35 years, joining soon after its founding in 1955.
